title: Ticket #6687: Incorporate Python chirp bindings into release
description: Chirp Python bindings are available in PIP. Let's get them into the mainline release.
remarks:
2018-May-30 08:34:57 by jpatton:
Perhaps we could consider including chirp as part of a htcondor-util python library. William S. at BNL has created some useful wrapper classes around the bindings that could be part of this native python library.

2020-Sep-22 12:55:33 by tlmiller:
Duplicate of #7330.
creator: tim
